data.title: Video game collection!
data.meta_description: Sooo.. what games do you own right now? And yes, I mean everything - from your consoles to your PC games! And no, it doesn't count for the games that...
data.text:
I actually don't own very much video games, but the ones that are mine:

DS and 3DS

Several Pokemon games (Diamond, Pearl, SoulSilver, Black, Black 2, X, Alpha Sapphire)

The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass

Mario Party DS (my dad found it at his workplace one day, I tried it for half an hour but got confused haha)

Bravely Default

Mario Land 3D (haven't tried it yet as I'm afraid I would suck at platformers, haha)

Animal Crossing: New Leaf

Ace Attorney Trilogy and Dual Destinies downloaded on my 3DS.

PC

My Steam list (which consists To the Moon, Transistor, Never Alone, and The Vanishing of Ethan Carter).

Dragon Age: Origins from EA's Origin

Roller Coaster Tycoon 2

Sims 2

Roller Coaster Tycoon and Sims 2 I'm not sure where they're at now, urgh. Some of the games listed I haven't tried yet, so I have quite a backlog, haha.

My dad and sister's game collection are much more massive than mine. Dad owned a lot of NES games and then later he went PC gaming and XBox 360, haha. My sister has some PS3 games.

Alright, trying this again after Origin crashed and completely froze my computer forcing me to restart:

Console games will shift between alphabetical order and their order on my shelves. I'm not organizing it any more than this. I think I got them all, but fuck if I know, my console games are so poorly organized ever since Boyfriend moved in and dumped his games in what was a very organized section of my room. ;~;

Currently, this list brings me to.. 960 games.

Orpheus says I have issues.
